short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open online resources with Google Drive Viewer. Supports various formats including DOC, XLS, PDF, PPT, ZIP, HTML, TXT, JS etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supports Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, ZIP and more formats. File should be online and publicly accessible. Opened files can be easily saved to your Google Drive.  

List of supported file types: https://support.google.com/drive/answer/37603?hl=en

Test extension on this page: http://browsernative.com/test/drive.php

Extension by BrowserNative.  Not created by or affiliated with Google.
